sources.title: The Blacksmith
sources.description: Blacksmiths' assistant inadvertent clowning around in the shop, gets into fight with the smithy who is then arrested and placed in jail. In the meantime, the assistant tries to help several customers with devastating comedic consequences.

sources.title: The Blacksmith
sources.description: Title: The Blacksmith Summary: Buster Keaton shoes horses and repairs cars, with mixed results. Directed by: Buster Keaton, Malcolm St. Clair Actors: Production Company: First National Pictures Release Date: 21 July 1922 (USA) Aspect Ratio: 1.33 : 1 Buster clowns around in a blacksmith's shop until he and the smithy get in a fight which sends the smithy to jail. Buster helps several customers with horses, then destroys a Rolls Royce while fixing the car parked next to it.
